title: Rajwadi Kundan Jhumka: A Timeless Treasure
materials: Emerald cabochons. Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Exquisite Jhumka design with Polki diamond settings. The top features a stylized floral motif with a central Emerald cabochon and Ruby cabochons, reminiscent of traditional Mughal-inspired jewelry. Dangling ruby and emerald beads add a touch of playful elegance. Intricate detailing throughout showcases exceptional craftsmanship.
colors: emerald green (Emerald). A classic and auspicious color palette favored in South Indian jewelry.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to showcase your traditional elegance. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian design and Mughal-inspired craftsmanship. The use of Polki diamonds lends a regal touch, while the vibrant ruby and emerald cabochons add a pop of color. This Jhumka is a timeless heirloom piece to be treasured for generations. Exceptional quality and durability ensured by the finest materials and expert Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
